 int computeHull(float[] pVertices, int pVertexCount, int pVertexOffsetX, int pVertexOffsetY, int pStride)
           
 

Method Detail

computeHull

int computeHull(float[] pVertices,
                int pVertexCount,
                int pVertexOffsetX,
                int pVertexOffsetY,
                int pStride)
Parameters:
pVertices - a interleaved float[] containing vertex data.
pVertexCount - the amount of vertices to look at in pVertices.
pVertexOffsetX - the offset of the x-coordinate in a vertex.
pVertexOffsetY - the offset of the y-coordinate in a vertex.
pStride - the stride between each vertex.
Returns:
